notes: Processes metallic ore feedstocks and carbon precursors into structural alloys, carbon-fiber composites, and advanced aerospace materials.
throughput_mult scales batch completion speed relative to the recipe's base build_time_s.
efficiency is the fraction of listed input materials consumed; values below 1.0 represent yield improvements from process control.
max_recipe_tier is the highest min_tech_tier recipe this unit can process.
max_concurrent_recipes is the number of recipe slots running in parallel.
